name: The Secret Ingredient (Za'atar): Za'atar Lamb Chops
description: Tender lamb chops, coated in Middle Eastern Za'atar, cook in minutes on the grill and become a simple, exotic, classy appetizer. So simple and fast, no one will believe you just transported them halfway around the world.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a grill pan on medium-high to high.
Take the lamb off the grill. Serve immediately with the yogurt-mint sauce.
